description: Improper Control of Filename for Include/Require Statement in PHP Program ('PHP Remote File Inclusion') vulnerability in Edge-Themes Cinerama - A WordPress Theme for Movie Studios and Filmmakers cinerama allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Cinerama - A WordPress Theme for Movie Studios and Filmmakers: from n/a through <= 2.4.

product.name: Cinerama - A WordPress Theme for Movie Studios and Filmmakers
